Content.Text:
Good morning. My apologies for calling on you
at this early hour, but I have some news that
might interest you.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is our annual <RED>Fireworks Show</RED>. In order to
make it an even bigger event for all to enjoy, I
have been asking everyone for donations.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The more we receive, the more impressive we
can make this event. Would you like to donate?
Money: <MOJI0>

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see... No, no, all donations are voluntary. If you
do not have anything to spare, that is all right.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you very much. This should help us make
the show a more exciting time for everyone.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you very much for your considerable
donation. I'm sure you'll be able to look forward
to a grand festival this evening.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>, for your boundless
generosity! With this large of a donation, this
year's festival will be one to remember!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Please come to the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>18:00
and 20:00</BLUE>. I hope we will see you there.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I am grateful for your generous spirit, but it
seems you do not have enough money.
